awd_abstract_narration: This "19th Informal Conference on Photochemistry" will be                  the next in a long series of conferences that have attracted                    international groups of leading research workers in its field.                  The conferences have played an important role as media of                       exchange of information and ideas among scientists at the                       forefront of photochemical research.                                                 These biennial conferences attract atmospheric chemists                    because they are brought into contact with workers at the                       cutting edge of "pure" gas photochemistry. On the other hand,                   workers in general photochemistry are made aware of problems                    and research opportunities in atmospheric chemistry.  The 19th                  Conference will have one full day of atmospheric chemistry                      papers.
org_div_long_name: Division of Atmospheric and Geospace Sciences
